exec: // Extract the id and email from the response
// Set the id and email as environment variables

graphql.query:
mutation Properties {
    properties {
        create(
            property: {
                id: "{{property_user_id}}"
                address: "{{property_address}}"
                address1: "{{property_address1}}"
                address2: "{{property_address2}}"
                address3: "{{property_address3}}"
                buildingReferenceNumber: "{{property_building_referencenumber}}"
                builtForm: "{{property_builtform}}"
                postcode: "{{property_postcode}}"
                posttown: "{{property_posttown}}"
                propertyType: "{{property_properttype}}"
                uprn: "{{property_uprn}}"
                uprnSource: "{{property_uprnsoruce}}"
                totalFloorArea: "{{property_floorarea}}"
                lmkKey: "{{property_lmkkey}}"
            }
        ) {
            id
            address
            address1
            address2
            address3
            buildingReferenceNumber
            builtForm
            postcode
            propertyType
            uprn
            uprnSource
            totalFloorArea
        }
    }
}
